changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE PROCEDURE Logging.DeleteLogEntriesOlderThan @MaxAgeInDays int = 14 AS BEGIN
DECLARE @CurrentTimeStamp dateTime
SET @CurrentTimeStamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
DELETE FROM Logging.Events WHERE DATEDIFF(day, Date, @CurrentTimeStamp) > @MaxAgeInDays
END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON Logging.DeleteLogEntriesOlderThan TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON Logging.DeleteLogEntriesOlderThan FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE Logging.DeleteLogEntriesOlderThan;
